resources:
Simon_Says_app GameViewActivity Tries left: Current Score: Firebase login Login with Google logout
Choose Nickname Type in your nickname Hello: Your Best Score: Hall Of Fame EASY MID Play HARD continue Welcome to Simon Says..
 by pressing the PLAY button you may choose on which difficulty to play.
 your score is generated by the amount of buttons you have pressed while copy catting the computer.
 the higher the difficulty the least amount of time between two buttons pressed by the computer meaning you will have less time to memorize the computer song.


ps. dont forget to check the Hall Of Fame! if your score is in the top 10 you might be there.

this app was created by:
 Ben Vahaba and Eden Todosi
 hope you enjoy it.
 for support mail us at:
 vahababen@gmail.com Your Final Score/>
